dt: {bc}a projecting usually molded member at the foot of a wall or pier or beneath the base of a column, pedestal, or superstructure

et: French, from Italian {it}zoccolo{/it} sock, socle, from Latin {it}socculus{/it}, diminutive of {it}soccus{/it} sock
shortdef: a projecting usually molded member at the foot of a wall or pier or beneath the base of a column, pedestal, or superstructure
